thread.title: Brandi West

author: Brandi West
title: Brandi West
text: This was my first experience transferring a large amount of money from NZ to Canada. Michael Brown was the person assigned to me and he was fantastic. He followed up each of my emails with a phone call to personally discuss my questions/concerns and patiently walked me through the process. If I ever need to transfer money again I wouldn't hesitate to use TorFX.
